title: Dprint Configuration File
description: Schema for a dprint configuration file.

projectType.description: The type of project Dprint is formatting.

oneOf.description: Dprint is formatting an open source project.
Dprint is formatting a commercial project and your company sponsored dprint. Thank you for being part of moving this project forward!
Dprint is formatting a commercial project and you are just trying it out or don't want to sponsor. If you are in the financial position to do so, please take the time to sponsor.

lineWidth.description: The width of a line the printer will try to stay under. Note that the printer may exceed this width in certain cases.

indentWidth.description: The number of characters for an indent.

useTabs.description: Whether to use tabs (true) or spaces (false) for indentation.

newlineKind.description: The kind of newline to use.

oneOf.description: For each file, uses the newline kind found at the end of the last line.
Uses the system standard (ex. crlf on Windows).

includes.description: Array of patterns (globs) to use to find files to format.

excludes.description: Array of patterns (globs) to exclude files or directories to format.

plugins.description: Array of plugin URLs to format files.
